name: House of Nothing
description:
if even x links to x/2

if odd x links to both 3x+1 and 3x+3

As the steam reaches your nostrils

All abstraction falls away

and you see reality of what it really is

Silver Ovoids in a network of glowing threads

Your mind rebels at the truth

and removes it's self one step from it.

use arrow keys for movement

bump into thing to learn what they are
